title: Verify number that no AccountSeacher when ticketsummaries call being made without hard refresh
custom_preconds:
Given
Redis cache is available
And
Api call with Refresh=false for the below ticketing account with tickets
 sajadul.hussain@mlb.com
custom_steps:
When
I made a Ticketsummaires api call for the below
 sajadul.hussain@mlb.com
custom_expected:
Then
Tickets should be display
And
Search for CID for the same call
And
No AccountSearcher should be found in the logs

title: Verify the barcode secret is showing as part of the barcode object when the TDC ticket is set to generate protected barcode
Verify when ticket with barcode secret is forwarded to another account a new barcode secret being generated for the same ticket
Verify the error message when multiple customer_query being made within 30 second
custom_preconds:
GIVEN
Account is having a TM ticketing accounts

Ref https://baseball.atlassian.net/browse/VAPI-1185
custom_steps:
WHEN
{{Boxoffice_url}}/api/v2/users/accounts?refresh=true&includeSSO=true
AND
After 10 Second {{Boxoffice_url}}/api/v2/users/accounts?refresh=true&includeSSO=true
custom_expected:
THEN
Error message Only 1 request per user to the customer_query API is allowed every

title: tm-account-discovery Verify the Account link when TM account is created prior to MLB accoount and email verified
custom_preconds:
Given
TM account is created
https://am.ticketmaster.com/integ/
AND
MLB account created with the same email as TM account
https://profile-qa.mlb.com/api/v1/users?activate=true
AND
Email is verified for the same email
https://profile-qa.mlb.com/api/v1/service/verification/emails/{Okta}
custom_steps:
When
`tm-accounts-discovery` Could function job run

https://console.cloud.google.com/cloudscheduler?project=mlb-venue-npd-72d5
custom_expected:
Then
Email verification should already sent the account link in `boxo-ticket-account`
AND
Verify the below subscriber 
tm-account-discovery-qa-sub
AND
 click on veiw message in below https://console.cloud.google.com/cloudpubsub/subscription/detail/tm-account-discovery-qa-sub?project=mlb-bbserv-ticketing-npd-e9b7
AND
Verify the boxOffice log in "clients.TmAcctPubSub" should show the newly account found from TM
AND
Verify the Fire store "boxo-ticket-accounts" account link should remain as is
https://console.cloud.google.com/firestore/data/boxo-ticket-accounts/00u100epvatiuRBxR0h8:169184-158-32?project=mlb-venue-npd-72d5
Example 
accountID: "955653"(string) 
accountKey: "955653-109-4249"(string) 
email: "mlbtixqa+tm7@gmail.com"(string) 
linkType: "explicit"(string)
nameOnAccount: "sajadul TDCSeven"(string) 
teamID: 109(number) 
uid: "00u10wphdu0XIwlR90h8"(string) 
unlinked: false(boolean) 
venueID: "4249"(string)

TM account is created

When
`tm-accounts-discovery` Could function job run
https://console.cloud.google.com/cloudscheduler?project=mlb-venue-npd-72d5
AND
submit a /users/account api request with refres=false
custom_expected:
Then
Verify the below subscriber 
tm-account-discovery-qa-sub
AND
 click on veiw message in below https://console.cloud.google.com/cloudpubsub/subscription/detail/tm-account-discovery-npd-sub?project=mlb-venue-npd-72d5

Account should not be linked in fire store as email is not a verified email
AND
users/accounts reponse should have the newly created TM ticketing accounts details

title: Verify Ticket scan and ballpark check in offer
custom_preconds:
This test should be conducted jointly TDC and MLB resources

Offergroup -Ballparkcheckin for the for the offer checkin
Tickets should be available to scan
custom_steps:
1. Verify the ticket scan information
2. Verify the bar code ( at least bar code should be available in TDC end)
3. Let TDC run the scan or SCAN the Ballpark app at the Scan device & verify the scan flag in BoxOffice
4. Verify the offer checkin in BP
5. click Done on BP
custom_expected:
1.Ticket should be `scanned=false` 
2.Barcode should be available 
3.Ticket should be `scanned=true`
            "forwardable": false,
            "forwardEligibilityReason": "[55] Ticket can't be forwarded: Already Scanned For Entry",
4. a) Update the BP date to event date
b) update the location to the event venue (same team)
Verify the below
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13303324)
5. Ballpark should show you've checked in
![](index.php?/attachments/get/13303325)
